location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Thomas Hodges, President and Governor at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for a packet containing updates on George Skipps embassy to Schirass (Shiraz), the expedition against Carrack [Kharg], and affairs at Bushire. Details of these updates are not present.
